                               int resistType,
                               boolean useCustom,
                               int customResist)
        Calculates the elemental portion of weapon damage
        Parameters:
        weaponDamage - the elemental damage
        resistType - the elemental resist type
        useCustom - use custom resists instead of mob's actual resists
        customResist - the custom resist amount to use
        Returns:
        the amount of elemental damage that wasn't resisted

      • mobRandomD20

        public int mobRandomD20(int offense,

        Rolls 20 for damage interval
        Parameters:
        offense - player offense calculation
        mitigation - mob's defense calculation
        Returns:
        random roll between 1 and 20

        Calculates melee critical damage
        Parameters:
        damage - pre crit melee damage
        minBase - minimum damage
        damageBonus - weapon damage bonus if primary weapon
        Returns:
        normal damage or normal damage multiplied by critical modifier
